alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:05PM EDT until July 13 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR JEFFERSON...NORTHWESTERN LEWIS AND NORTHEASTERN OSWEGO COUNTIES... At 203 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Clayton to near Adams Center to Sandy Island Beach State Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Sandy Island Beach State Park, Fort Drum, Stony Point, Carthage, Pulaski, West Carthage, Clayton, Adams, and Dexter. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 37 and 52. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
